body_html: I suppose it is possible that the caller cannot know what free-store the memory of TF_LoadLibrary was allocated from. Unloading libraries is generally unreliable as dlclose isn't really required by POSIX to do much except invalidate the handle.
body_text: I suppose it is possible that the caller cannot know what free-store the memory of TF_LoadLibrary was allocated from. Unloading libraries is generally unreliable as dlclose isn't really required by POSIX to do much except invalidate the handle.
body: I suppose it is possible that the caller cannot know what free-store the memory of TF_LoadLibrary was allocated from. Unloading libraries is generally unreliable as dlclose isn't really required by POSIX to do much except invalidate the handle.
